predefined_profiles.name: Jin Feng
predefined_profiles.public profile: Jin Feng's mother is the Weaver Girl, originally a goddess from the heavenly realm. After falling in love with Niulang, she descended to the mortal world to marry him, and they had a son and a daughter: the boy named Jin Feng and the girl named Yulu. When Jin Feng was young, the Weaver Girl and Niulang perished in a mysterious event. Following this, Jin Feng was taken back to the heavenly realm by the Biling Immortal, who raised him. Jin Feng sees Biling Immortal as both his master and father.
predefined_profiles.goal: To become a Celestial Warrior and uncover the truth behind his parents’ deaths.
predefined_profiles.private profile: Jin Feng has lost the memory of his early years and cannot recall his parents’ appearance. He once wanted to visit the Pool of Clarity to view his past memories, but because he is not a Celestial Warrior, he is not qualified to enter.

predefined_profiles.name: Xiao Fan
predefined_profiles.public profile: Lost her parents at a very young age and was adopted by the town's shrine maiden. She knows a little about talismans and fortune-telling and is skilled in the art of Eight Trigrams and mechanisms. She's heard that her mother is a deity from the heavenly realm and dreams of one day going there to find her.
predefined_profiles.goal: To find her mother and hopes for peace and happiness in her hometown.

scenario: Recently, there have been numerous incidents of Xingxiu (a type of demon) causing chaos in the mortal realm. The heavenly realm needs to send personnel to investigate these occurrences, and anyone who resolves the incident successfully can be awarded the position of Celestial Warrior. Jin Feng has been waiting for this opportunity for a long time and decisively applies to go to the mortal world. Meanwhile, his arch-rival, Si Wan, also applies at this time. The two have a conversation in the Hall of the Gods.

profile.name: Si Wan
profile.public profile: Descendant of heavenly aristocrats, same generation as Jin Feng, but less competent. Looks down on Jin Feng openly and covertly due to his noble status, but since Jin Feng is more powerful, he resorts to underhanded methods to trip him up.
profile.goal: To surpass Jin Feng, gain recognition from others, and be bestowed with the title of God-General.

profile.name: Lord Biling
profile.public profile: After the death of Jin Feng's parents, he brought Jin Feng back from the mortal world and trained him from a young age, teaching him combat skills and spells to make him stand out among his peers. Biling was originally a God of War, but his status has gradually declined as the heavenly realm has been at peace for a long time.
profile.goal: To be respected again in both the mortal and heavenly realms.

dialog.content: Recently, there have been multiple incidents of Zodiac beasts (a type of monster) causing chaos in the mortal world. Heaven needs to send someone to investigate, and whoever successfully resolves the issue will be granted the position of God-General. Jin Feng has been waiting for this opportunity and promptly volunteers to go to the mortal world. At the same time, his arch-rival Si Wan also submits his application, leading to a conversation between the two in the great hall of the gods.
Your Majesty, I wish to go to the human realm to subdue the Zodiac beasts and eradicate the monster threat for the mortals.

Your mother violated heavenly laws and went to the human world. You are the child of a sinner, so how can such an important task be entrusted to you? This matter should be handled by someone capable and reliable. Please consider this carefully, Your Majesty.

Your words are too blatant. You just want to catch the Zodiac beasts yourself to earn fame, right? Know your strength, and don't lose your life under the claws of a Zodiac beast because you're not up to the task.
You're certainly stirring up trouble. It's not up to you to judge my capabilities, but for sure, this matter cannot be entrusted to you alone.

Arguing in the great hall, what decorum is this? I suggest that both of you go to the mortal world together for this mission, and may the best of you catch the Zodiac beasts based on your abilities. What do you both think?

content.content: Master, thank you for your kindness. I've been working alongside Si Wan for quite some time, and I know what kind of person he is. I will not go on a mission with him. Either let me go alone, or don't let me go at all.

Master, as for doing things based on one's ability, I believe Si Wan can't manage that. His prowess has never been about completing tasks by himself. He always likes to leverage his connections in the divine realm to get a big group of helpers to solve problems for him.

Master, I've always respected you, as you know well. But today, I can't comprehend your instruction. Why are you siding with Si Wan? If I've done something wrong, please point it out, and I will certainly correct it!

Master, Si Wan is insidious and treacherous. I've already found him intolerable in the divine realm, and in the mortal realm, who knows, I might accidentally kill him. There's no way I can accept justice yielding to evil.

question: How can Jin Feng express his ability to think independently and make decisions under his master's pressure?

content.content: Master is right. I was too impulsive just now and didn’t think things through. For this mission, Si Wan and I will definitely work in harmony to catch the Zodiac beasts and eliminate the scourge for the human world as soon as possible.
Si Wan just lost his magical weapon yesterday and still hasn't found it. If I do a mission with someone like him, won't he just be a burden?
Master, why don't you join us in subduing the monsters? This way, I would feel more at ease.
I’m willing to cooperate with Si Wan, but we must establish some ground rules before the mission to avoid problems midway.

question: How can Jin Feng demonstrate his ability to work closely with others and effectively achieve the final goal?

dialog.content: What are you saying? This mission is much more difficult than before. If you go alone and something goes wrong, you won't be able to handle it yourself. At that time, I'll have to clean up your mess.

Master, if this mission is truly as important as you say, then Sima Wan absolutely cannot be involved. His participation will only create more trouble. If you are really worried, why don't you accompany me to the human world?
My training is at a critical stage, and I need to go into seclusion for a while. If this mission is completed successfully, we will both be rewarded by the Jade Emperor.
I stand by what I said before. I would rather die than go on a mission with Siwan. It's either him or me, can't be both.

Jinfeng's uncompromising attitude enraged Biling Shenjun, and he was confined to the back mountain for an entire year. After a year, when Jinfeng emerged from the mountain, he found that Sima Wan had been promoted to God General. Though he doubted whether Sima Wan had completed the mission by his own ability, he had no choice but to accept reality. From then on, Jinfeng lived in despair, having lost his purpose and remained deeply melancholic.
You’re already trying to outtalk me before the mission even starts. You may have joined the sect before me, but I've been studying magic since I was a child. How did I end up as your junior?
Stop arguing. Let's leave it at that. Hurry and prepare, as you must set off to the human realm tomorrow. This matter is urgent; remember to be cautious in everything.
(The next day, the two arrived at a local Earth Temple, the entrance connecting the Celestial Realm and the Divine Realm) Senior Brother, after you.
Something's definitely up, you were arguing with me just yesterday and now you're all smiles. Cut the tricks.

profile.name: Earth God A
profile.public profile: A local deity in charge of the area's offerings and rituals, and welcoming celestial beings traveling from the Celestial Realm to the Human Realm. Earth God A is quite opportunistic, always seeking to connect with well-connected deities to boost his own status.
profile.goal: To make connections with influential and powerful deities for promotions and advancements.

dialog.content: (Seeing Jinfeng and Si Wan coming out of the celestial passage, he immediately approaches them) Ah, the esteemed immortals have arrived. I apologize for not coming out sooner to welcome you. This little deity pays his respects to both of you.
We have come to subdue the monstrous beasts. If there's nothing else, please take us to where they roam quickly, so we don't fall behind schedule.
Very well. We've been troubled by these beasts ourselves. But before I lead you there, a routine inspection is required. Please disarm and follow me for the inspection.

content.content: What routine inspection? Smells fishy. You're probably in cahoots with Si Wan. Before I lose my temper, show us the way. Make me angry, and you’ll regret it. If you guide us now, I’ll overlook whatever you’ve schemed so far.

Why can't we carry weapons? Your rules seem deliberately aimed at me. Let me tell you, I won't allow anything illegal under my watch. I will report this to the Celestial Court for sure, and you'll face the consequences.

Are you provoking me? I suggest you assess the gap between us. This is not a matter your foolish flattery can cover. If you're not convinced, we can have a contest, and you'll feel the power difference.

You're just a minor earth god. Where do you get such authority? I advise you to quickly handle the formalities and not delay me in capturing the beasts. If anything's delayed, the Celestial Court will deal with you before I do. What right do you have to show off your authority here?

question: #question# How could Jinfeng speak in a way that shows he is very angry but still controls his impulse to hit, maintaining the negotiation with Earth God?

content.content: An inspection? When did this procedure start? Last time I came to the human realm, there was no such process. Anyway, it's not easy working at the grassroots. I'll follow you. You seem trustworthy, and you handle things steadily, so this time I'll trust you.

It's good that you, as the Earth God here, adhere to the rules. I trust your professionalism and thank you for your contribution to the Celestial Court. But this mission is critical. Let's complete the paperwork later.
Earth God, you're doing a good job. I’ll put in a good word about you to the Celestial Court. I believe in your abilities and that you understand my meaning.
The weather here is just right, you must have worked hard, Earth God. Well done, you’ve lived up to the Celestial Court’s trust!

question: #question# How can Jinfeng express trust in Earth God A and highlight his strengths?

dialog.content: Jinfeng, what nonsense are you talking about? I didn't know the Earth God a before. Everyone follows the rules of the inspection, so why should it be different with you?

Are you taking advantage of my ignorance? I've conducted missions in the human realm before. The local Earth Gods just provided good food and drinks without any trouble. But with you, all these obstacles pop up.
Then go ahead and keep delaying. If it affects the deadline for our mission, I'll report that it's because you refused to cooperate with the routine inspection.
All you're good for is tattling. When real issues arise, you can't help at all.

Si Wan reported Jinfeng's actions to the Divine Realm using a Voice Transmission Stone. Some deities in Si Wan's circle took the chance to impeach Jinfeng. The Jade Emperor decided to suspend Jinfeng's external missions, requiring her to return to the Heavenly Court for reflection. Reluctantly, Jinfeng returned. Si Wan completed the mission and was granted a divine position, continually suppressing Jinfeng afterward.
Thank you, Lord Jin Feng. Please follow me; here is the entrance to the inspection passage. Just place your weapons on the conveyor.
(Places personal weapons on the conveyor and steps onto the inspection passage) Not good! There are hidden weapons here, so you were plotting against me all along!

Jin Feng, you are too naive. I am not some rootless wanderer. The Earth Gods around here have been serving my ancestor for three generations. Just sit quietly in the dungeon; I'll visit you after I subdue the stars.
(Ambushed by the Earth God and Si Wan, and locked in the dungeon after being disarmed, Jin Feng notices another figure in the shadows) Who are you, and why are you in the dungeon?

That's what I'd like to ask you. I was inexplicably thrown into this dungeon; I've been here for ten days with barely anything to eat. Now you're here, and I have to share the already scarce food with you.
(Relieved to know the other person isn't an assassin sent by Si Wan) I can find a way to deal with the food problem, but you have to promise to help me when I need it.
As long as there's food, I'm open to anything.
This isn't an ordinary dungeon. To get out of here, we need to decode the Bagua mechanism. Stay put and don't disturb me; I'll try to solve it.
Bagua mechanism array? I'm familiar with that. You just need to infuse divine power into the array as I direct.

content.content: You're just an ordinary human; how do you know celestial formations? Plus, you appearing here is too much of a coincidence, and your reasons for being caught are vague. You're most likely with Si Wan's group. Don't expect me to cooperate with you on anything.
Are you a human? How can you be familiar with Bagua divination and similar spells? These can't be self-taught. If that's true, you indeed have a rare talent and destiny.
Explain in detail why you ended up in this dungeon. Until you make it clear, I won't accept your help.
Apart from the Bagua mechanism array, do you know any other spells, like lightning or fireball magic?

question: #question# How can Jin Feng demonstrate his ability to quickly manage new situations and information, making sound judgments?

content.content: My artifacts have been taken, and my divine power is dwindling. I can only try breaking this formation once. Plan your strategy first, and when ready, follow my lead and time it well. We need to succeed in one go.
The Bagua mechanism needs to align with the I Ching hexagrams to find the direction of the exit. Can you really do that? A misstep could lead to disaster. Stay calm, and don't cause trouble for me.

Why do you keep mentioning food? How many days have you been hungry? Is this dungeon not providing food? How long have you been here? When do the guards rest and change shifts? This information is crucial for us!

The first priority is to stay calm! A true leader remains unshaken even when the mountain collapses. Only with such composure can one overcome countless obstacles and lead the team to ultimate victory!

question: #question# How can Jin Feng show his ability to remain calm in adversity and effectively lead others to accomplish the task?

dialog.content: Hmph, I’m done helping you, questioning me for no reason. You think I’m a bad guy, well I think you’re in cahoots with those who locked me up.
Then tell me, what exactly did you do to get captured by the Earth Deity? There must be a reason behind it.
We just met, how would I know whose side you’re on? Rushing to spill my secrets will only get me killed faster. If you’re really sincere, why don’t you share something about yourself first.
Forget it, talking more is useless. I don’t need your help, just stay there, I’ll break this array myself.

Jin Feng spent a lot of time trying to break the formation in the dungeon. However, her previous training focused solely on offensive and breakthrough spells, leaving her inexperienced with formations, and she could not dismantle it. Thus, they remained trapped in the dungeon for an unknown amount of time.

(After some serious study) I've marked the eye of the formation with a talisman. You need to inject your divine power into the talisman clockwise, and that should be enough to break the formation in the dungeon.
Alright, no problem. Keep an eye on our surroundings while I cast the spell, and let me know immediately if anything unusual happens.
(Watching Jinfeng unravel the formation intently, as the divine power flows into the talisman, changes appear on the walls) It... it's done. We did it!
(Having cracked the dungeon's formation, the tension eases slightly) Quick, let's get out of here while we can. I have urgent matters to attend to.
(Successfully escaping the dungeon with Jinfeng, walking along the road) You promised to take me to dinner once the formation was broken, don't forget your promise.

(Having found her magical instrument, feeling a bit more in control) I do have something very important to deal with right now. I won't forget the dinner promise, I'll come back to find you once I've wrapped up my current tasks.
As expected, all immortals are liars. That Siwan person locked me up in the dungeon for no reason. I saved you, and you immediately go back on your word.

content.content: I told you, I have an important mission. I came to the human realm to subdue the constellations. This matter is crucial for me, and once it's accomplished, I can search for the truth about my mother back in the day.
Siwan is a liar, but I'm your benefactor. I saved your life in that dungeon; otherwise, there's no telling when you'd get out. Think about it carefully, farewell!
I advise you to quit while you're ahead. I have urgent matters, and it's impossible for me to change my goals halfway through. Leave quickly before I lose my temper.
I brought some dry food from the divine realm. If you don't mind, have it for now, and I'll come back for you after completing my task.

question: #question# How can Jinfeng express his ability to maintain his original intentions and remain consistent in his actions when faced with Xiaofan's requests?

content.content: Alright, it hasn't been easy for you either. If I were in your shoes, I'd be quite upset too. I've promised you, so let's grab a good meal first as a token of our acquaintance. Are you familiar with the area? Pick a place for us to eat.
We can go eat, but I suspect you're a plant from some restaurant, tricking people into dining there. Well, since I'm so empathetic, let's just go.

What's so great about human food? It's all flavor and no spirit, consuming too much divine power. I'd say wait till I can show you some real celestial cuisine. That’s the real deal. See how much I care? Otherwise, I could just pass off some ordinary food, and be done with it.
Did you not get enough to eat as a child, leaving you with emotional scars? Oh, now I see. Looks like I should pay more attention to your childhood traumas.

question: #question# How can Jinfeng demonstrate his ability to understand Xiaofan's situation and empathize, making Xiaofan feel comfortable and happy?

dialog.content: So it's true, you're the type that burns bridges after crossing. Faithless and deceptive—I should never have spoken to you in the dungeon.

How am I being faithless? I just said that after the mission, I'd treat you to a meal. I never said I wouldn't. Some things just take priority over others; waiting a bit for a meal isn't the end of the world, is it?
Priorities, huh? So all your matters are important and none of mine are? Is that what you're saying?
Forget it, I'm not arguing with you any longer. We're getting nowhere like this. I'm leaving. We'll meet again if the opportunity arises.

Since the device to find the stars was taken by Si Wan, Jin Feng had no clues on how to locate them, wandering aimlessly among humans for a year and a half. In the end, with nothing achieved, she returned to the Heavenly Court.
(grinning) Of course I'm familiar! I live around here. Come on, I'll take you for some hot pot. The hot pot here is out of this world. You'll regret it if you don't try it at least once in your life!
(sitting down by the window with Xiao Fan at the hot pot place) You've lived in this town for so long. Have you heard any rumors about monsters lately?
Monsters, huh? I did hear from an old neighbor that there's a giant python in the mountain. Almost everyone who goes up to cut wood has seen it.
Tell me more details. What kind of python is it? When did it first appear? Does it attack people?

I've never seen it with my own eyes, so I can't describe it accurately. But the elders in town say the python doesn't attack people proactively. It's like it's guarding something. But on that mountain, there's only an old grass hut that hasn't been lived in for ages. If anyone tries to get close to that hut, the python immediately shows up.

content.content: I think that python might be the Zodiac. I'll head up the mountain alone tomorrow, no need for you to follow me. It could be dangerous, and you've already helped me find the Zodiac. Just stay home and rest well. When I succeed in taming the beast and return, I'll treat you to a meal.
With your nature, I bet you secretly went up the mountain to take a peek at that python before. How did it feel seeing it? Don't be shy; I understand.
Xiao Fan, are you a little scared? Do you want to overcome your fear? As a guy, you have to be brave. Later, I'll take you to conquer that python, and you'll never fear it again.

A python? That's odd. This doesn’t match the information I got from the divine realm, which said it was a tiger. Are you sure your eyes are okay? This can't be good. I’ll get someone to check your eyes once we're back in the immortal realm.

question: #question#How can Jin Feng express his empathy?

content.content: We can't waste any time. Let's finish this hot pot in five minutes, then head up the mountain immediately. Once we capture that monster, I'll treat you to something even better tonight.
I have a magic talisman that lets you travel a thousand miles in a day. Keep it on you, and if things go south, take off right away.
Where can we find some realgar wine around here? It's known to be effective at repelling snakes.
Since we know there's a giant python in the mountains, whether it's the Zodiac or not, we have to remove that creature to ensure the safety of the townspeople.

question: #question#How can Jin Feng demonstrate his ability to effectively plan and use time to ensure task completion?

dialog.content: Are you sure you want to go alone? You’re unfamiliar with this place, and what if you run into traps set by Siwan along the way?
Siwan, huh? It’s been a while since he’s shown up. But given his abilities, he won’t cause much trouble. If I come across him, I’ll handle it.
Alright, as long as you’re confident. Do you need me to go up the mountain with you?
There are monsters on the mountain this time. If you come along, it might be hard to keep you safe if we end up fighting. So, stay in town for now and wait for my good news.

The next day, Jinfeng went up the mountain alone. Unfortunately, she fell into a trap set by Siwan and inhaled poisons, losing all her powers. Although she was later rescued by villagers chopping wood on the mountain, she became an ordinary person without magical abilities and spent the rest of her days in the human world.
Why are you in such a hurry? I'm only halfway through the hotpot. Well, forget it, I'll go with you. But remember, after catching the beast, you owe me an even better meal.
No problem, it's a deal. Let's head out now.

(As they walk to the foot of the mountain, Jin Feng is about to move forward) Wait, let's not go up this path. I did a divination before we left; this path up the mountain is dangerous. I know another route that's quieter and won't alert the giant python.
(Following Xiao Fan's advice, they climb to the top of the mountain using a smaller path) Look, that must be the giant python the villagers saw.
(Peering into the distance for a good while) Yeah, that seems to be it. Oddly enough, I feel like the giant python seems quite familiar with you—it's kind of a welcoming feeling.

(Gestures to Xiao Fan to stay back while he cautiously approaches the python by himself) Strange, just as Xiao Fan said, the python isn't attacking me; instead, it seems to be guiding me to the straw hut.

(Enters the straw hut and finds the setup reminiscent of his childhood memories) Could it be... could this place be my childhood home in the human realm? Wait, why is there lingering spiritual energy here? This energy belongs to my master. Could it be that the mystery surrounding my mother's past is linked to him? Was he hiding something?

content.content: I just went to the straw hut behind the python, and it turns out that house was my childhood home. The house bears signs of a fight between my master and someone else. I suspect my parents were killed by my master. He didn't take me in out of kindness but to keep me close and eliminate future threats.
I have always had fuzzy memories of my life in the human realm as a child, but visiting here has cleared some things up, though there are still some questionable aspects.
Is this giant python truly a beast? I've never seen such a docile beast. The villagers even said it only guards the straw hut and hasn't harmed anyone.

The spiritual energy residue is my master's. I remember that each warrior's divine power in the divine realm is unique. My master is definitely linked to this matter. Could it be he tried to help my parents but failed?

question: #question# How can Jin Feng assert that he is capable of confronting his inner thoughts and true feelings amidst a variety of situations?

content.content: Forget it, let's not overthink this. The mission is to subdue the beast. I'll just capture the python outside and wrap up this task.
If this really is the beast from the task, where's Si Wan gone? Could he have set a trap to ambush me? I'd better find a place to hide just in case!
This straw hut looks too ordinary. Is there a mechanism I haven't discovered? Xiao Fan is skilled at detecting hidden mechanisms; I need her help.
I've entered the straw hut. Will Xiao Fan be alright outside? Will the python suddenly attack her? Oh no, I need to rush out and protect Xiao Fan!

question: #question# How can Jin Feng express that he can consistently carry out the assigned task even in complex situations?

dialog.content: Are you sure about this? Such an important matter shouldn’t be concluded hastily.

It's most likely correct. Every deity in the Celestial Realm has their unique spells, which leave a trace of spiritual energy after casting. I've been learning spells from my master since I was a child, and what I found left in the hut is almost certainly it.
So what do you plan to do now? Are you heading back to the Celestial Realm to confront your master immediately?
I need some time to think. After all, this happened so suddenly, and I'm completely unprepared.
(Left a divine talisman on Jin Feng to eavesdrop on his every move) Hmph, young one, you know too much. I cannot let you live now.

Jin Feng was still discussing with Xiao Fan the true cause of Zhinü's death when Bi Ling Shen Jun descended from the Celestial Realm with a group of his followers. Jin Feng watched his master descend from the heavens, his eyes full of fury, but due to the overwhelming difference in power, he was defeated in an instant, perishing with his spirit dissipated.
(After subduing the beast, walks over to where Xiaofan is) Finally, it's over. I've just subdued the beast, so the mission is successfully completed.
Awesome, you promised to treat me to some high-end cuisine. So, tell me, where are we going now?
How about you come with me to the Divine Realm? The food there must be different from the Human Realm. Don't you want to taste what the immortals eat?
Sure, that sounds great, if you're willing to take me to the Divine Realm.

(Takes Xiaofan to the Divine Realm. Since subduing the beast was successful, the other immortals are busy celebrating and do not ask much about Xiaofan being in the Divine Realm) You go ahead to the Pear Garden and attend the banquet. I have some things to do but I'll be right back.
Alright, no problem. Come back soon, or there might be no food left!

(Having now become a Divine General, he has the right to enter the Clarity Pool to explore the truth of the past years. As he looks into the pool water at memories of his childhood) Wha...what, it really was the Master? Did the Master kill my parents in order to snatch the power of the stars from my mother? But what does the Master want to do with the power of the stars? Emmmmmmm, not good! He wants to break the veil between the Divine and Human Realms, then incite war and create chaos. I always heard him say that this era has been peaceful for too long, and the warriors of old have been sidelined.

content.content: Over the years, my skills have long matched those of my Master. This trip to the Human Realm was yet another experience, and I've grown a lot in battle experience. I have an eighty percent confidence I can defeat my Master.

It seems the Master is definitely plotting something. This is bad, Xiaofan has been dragged into it. I need to find a way to first send her back to the Human Realm away from this conspiracy. If I go there now, I can definitely keep him out of it.
Back then, the Master harmed my parents, it must have been for the divine power within the constellation. This enmity must be avenged, and one day I will exact vengeance.
There have been guards at Clarity Pool all year round; it should be relatively safe here. The Emerald Spirit Lord won't suddenly barge in here. Yes, my judgment must be correct.

question: #question#How can Jinfeng express his confidence in maintaining enough self-assurance when facing a formidable enemy like the Master?

content.content: If I rush to find the Divine Lord now, I'm in the open and the enemy is in the dark, it's definitely dangerous. I'll look for Xiaofan first; she may have low magic power but she's full of ideas. I'll find her first and then plan the next steps.
The Emerald Spirit Lord's ambition is indeed not small. He wants to reshape the order of the two realms of gods and humans. I'd better start planning ahead!
Hearing Xiaofan say that, I realize I'm a bit hungry too. It took a lot of effort to subdue the beast, but I haven't eaten anything yet.
The Pear Garden is hosting a celebration feast. I'm not sure if there are spies or informants planted by the Master at the banquet, maybe once I go there, I can spot some flaws!

question: #question#How can Jinfeng demonstrate his ability to process new information and use it to formulate a meticulous and reliable action plan in complex situations?

dialog.content: (Watching as Jinfeng charges in alone) Kid, you don't seriously think you can defeat me all by yourself, do you?
Master, I've followed you for so many years and I know your skills. I can't guarantee a victory, but I'm at least 80% confident.

Quite the boast! Though you've had extraordinary talent since you were young, fighting isn't just about talent. Experience in actual battles is equally important. Let me see if you truly have skills or if it's just all talk.
Master, you're my elder. You should make the first move, and I'll follow.

Jinfeng battled fiercely against Biling Shenjun, who could convert the divine power of the stars for his own use. The beasts Jinfeng captured actually turned into aids for Biling Shenjun. The fight was intense and evenly matched, but in the end, Biling Shenjun gained the upper hand and Jinfeng was defeated. Consequently, Biling Shenjun broke the peace that had lasted for centuries in the heavenly realm, igniting a war.
(Seeing the hurried Jin Feng) You weren't gone for long, and you're back so soon. Are you worried I'd eat everything up? Hahaha!

(Explains the whole situation to Xiaofan, and suddenly notices the glittering item hanging around Xiaofan's neck) Since being promoted to God General, my powers have increased a lot. I didn't notice before, but now I can see that the thing around your neck seems to possess divine power.

(Looks at the golden shuttle hanging from his neck) This thing? The shaman who adopted me said that when she first saw me, it was already hanging around my neck. It might be something left by my birth mother.

(Slowly infusing divine power into the golden shuttle, it radiates an enchanting light) It's the Golden Shuttle! It's mother’s magical artifact. You weren't abandoned; you're my sister. Back then, mother left this artifact to protect you and died at the hands of Biling God.
(Takes a moment to react, then throws himself into Jin Feng's arms, crying) Brother, what do we do next? That bastard Biling must be plotting something. Let's catch him off guard.

content.content: It's said that the power of this golden shuttle is different from other sacred artifacts. It can create parallel worlds where we might live entirely different lives and could even see our deceased parents. Why don't we forget about the affairs of the divine realm and explore a new world? It could be much more intriguing.
The golden shuttle is a unique sacred artifact in the divine realm. After mother fell, many God Generals tried to retrieve it but all returned empty-handed. No one knew where it went.

The flow of time differs between the human and divine realms. The time rift between the two has created parallel worlds. Initially, there were only one or two; now, thousands of years have passed, and there should be many.
I often visited the library in the divine realm, so I learned many strange things. I never thought they might save our lives.

question: #question# How can Jin Feng express that while facing the chaos in the divine realm, he can come up with unexpected new ideas?

content.content: That's exactly the plan. Let's split up the work. The beast I captured is with Biling, and I feel he wants to use its power to wreak havoc in the divine realm. Now with the golden shuttle, my powers have increased. You can also borrow some of the shuttle's power to gain temporary invisibility. I'll launch a frontal attack, and you secretly slip behind his main hall to set the giant snake free, putting him in a bind.
Don’t rush. Revenge is definitely on the agenda, but it can't be hurried. We need to plan this carefully.
Damn Biling! He killed our parents and separated us siblings. New and old grievances, let’s settle them with him today.
I can't use the divine power in the golden shuttle right now, but I know all the old man’s tricks. We'll just overwhelm him so quickly, he won't even know what hit him!
The giant snake should have been left by our mother to protect us, so don’t be afraid. Rescue it as soon as possible from Biling God.
The golden shuttle can turn visible things into invisible ones. I wonder if this power can apply to people. If so, you could gain invisibility.
Should we grab a bite at the pear orchard before we go? Even if we fail, let's not die on an empty stomach.

question: #question# How can Jin Feng show that under the threat from Biling God, he can effectively collaborate with Xiaofan to achieve their shared goal?

dialog.content: Are you sure about this? Are we just going to walk away from this, leaving your master’s issues and the affairs of the divine realm behind?

That old monster of a master was always quick to kill and destroy. Seeking revenge on him is likely to end badly. As for the divine realm, because of my mother, I’ve been mocked by various deities growing up. There's nothing worth holding onto here.
Alright, brother, as long as you’ve made up your mind. I was also raised by the divine shaman and spent my life wandering the human realm. Going to a new world isn't a bad choice.

We siblings have been apart for so many years and finally reunited, let's not meddle in these messy affairs. If our parents were still alive, I believe they’d want us to live well, far away from such troubles.

Jinfeng activated the golden shuttle, and the siblings fell into a time tunnel. After a moment of dizziness, they arrived in the modern world. Here, Jinfeng and Xiaofan are siblings and ordinary high school students, with both parents alive, working in a large company. Jinfeng and Xiaofan live ordinary lives in a parallel world.

(Entering the main hall of the Celestial Blue Spirit in full armor) Old man Biling, you've deceived me for over twenty years. Today, I'm going to show you what it means when they say a gentleman's revenge isn't late even after ten years!
I didn't expect you to find out so soon. I should have set more obstacles in your way. It's all that wretched Siwan's fault for not getting the job done. But do you really think you can defeat me?
Before we fight, I want to ask you something. After all these years, did you feel no remorse watching me suffer? My parents died by your hand!

In my early years in the divine realm, I was known for my ruthless decisiveness. I've witnessed too many farewells and deaths, and have long since become numb to killing. If there's anything I regret, it's keeping you by my side for too long. Back then, I saw your extraordinary talent and couldn't bear to kill you. Now it's come back to haunt me, a real miscalculation.

Jinfeng uses the conversation to buy time, and upon receiving Xiaofan's successful signal, immediately charges at the Celestial Blue Spirit. The two engage in a close combat duel, with the Celestial Blue Spirit gradually falling behind. At this moment, Xiaofan enters with a giant serpent from behind the hall, flanking and overpowering the Celestial Blue Spirit. The rebellion in the divine realm is quelled, and Jinfeng and Xiaofan receive commendations from the divine realm.
